body.p: In finalising the 2018 Amendments, the Board did not:

li.p: make the concentration test an indicator, rather than determinative. Such a change would have been inconsistent with the objective of reducing the costs of applying IFRS 3 by providing a test that is designed to be simple in some straightforward cases that are easy to explain.
provide further guidance on the term ‘substantially all’ because that term is already used in several IFRS Standards.
